name: Make Superconductors Float Again
description:
A game for the Quantum Game Jam 2016 with the theme Superconductivity.

The goal of the game is to move the scientist to the quantum processor with the help of superconductors, magnets and a gun that freezes stuff!


How to play:

WASD - Movement (hold W for a higher jump),

Left Mouse Button - Shoot freezing liquid,

Right Mouse Button - Move magnets


Credits:

  • Esko Haila (programming, some graphics)
  • Risto Haila (programming, level design)
  • Sallamari Rantanen (programming, game design)
  • Ville Kentala (3D and 2D graphics, programming, sounds)
  • Janos Honkonen (game design)
